previously

In 2024, I was a research intern @KAUST in Prof. Richt√°rik‚Äôs group, focusing on optimization.

In 2023, I was a research intern @ENS Paris under the supervision of Bruno Loureiro, exploring stochastic gradient descent dynamics beyond the unstructured assumption. Before in the same year, I was a research intern @IST Austria under the supervision of Prof. Marco Mondelli, where I worked on approximate message passing and information theoretic limits of a model of inference.

I graduated with an M2 in probability and statistics, Universit√© Paris-Saclay, Institut de Math√©matique d‚ÄôOrsay. Supervisor(s) were my current advisor(s). I also hold an MS in data science from Bocconi University. My supervisor was Prof. Carlo Lucibello. Before my graduate studies, I completed a bachelor in economics and computer science.

Jul 1, 2025 I will continue with a PhD in statistics at the Orsay institute! We will work on the low-degree method. Starting in November after a short break.
